title: Vegetable Crudites With Herbed Cream Cheese
directions: Bring a large pot of water to boil. Trim the ends of the asparagus and place into boiling water. Blanch for 30 seconds. Drain and immediately rinse under cold water.
Boil the potatoes until tender, then slice into 1/4-inch thick rounds. Let cool.
Slice the carrots in half lengthwise and set aside.

Arrange the vegetables in single layers on large platters. Spoon the cream cheese into a pastry bag fitted with a pastry tip, or a freezer bag with the corner snipped offÂ and pipe the cream cheese onto the vegetables.
ingredients: 1 pound small purple or red potatoes
